title: Azamat Balkarov
text:
Azamat Zaurovich Balkarov (; born 5 February 1987) is a Russian former professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="PFC%20Spartak%20Nalchik">PFC Spartak Nalchik</a> on 11 July 2016 in a game against <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar">FC Kuban Krasnodar</a>.
